alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 1:22PM EST until March 09 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Litchfield County in northwestern Connecticut, Schoharie County, western Ulster and western Greene Counties in eastern New York and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates this afternoon will be in the 1 inch an hour or greater range in any heavy snow bands.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
